name: shaggily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has or is covered with long, rough, and untidy hair: Her hair was greying, thick, and shaggily cut. The lead singer is 36 years old, tall, dark, and shaggily handsome.
More examplesFewer examplesHer long, soft hair hung shaggily down her back.He plays her shaggily amiable best friend who is always there for her when things go wrong.She looked shaggily relaxed in a T-shirt emblazoned with a photograph of a 70s rock band.
